title: My Brother's Bedroom
brief_description: A winner in the Junior Animation category for Screen It 2016. My brother’s bedroom door was always closed. I was never allowed into his bedroom. What was the mystery? I couldn’t stand it any longer and had to risk everything to have a look at what was behind his bedroom door.
